sentences.en: He only got a plurality on November 3rd, just 49 percent.
sentences.cn: 他在11月3号的选举中仅获得了49%的相对多数票。

sentences.en: He won, but only by the skin of his teeth.
sentences.cn: 他赢了，但是赢得十分勉强。

sentences.en: His house was the only settled home I had as a child.
sentences.cn: 他的房子是我儿时唯一固定的家。

sentences.en: I met him only the once, and that was enough.
sentences.cn: 我就见过他那一次，那就让我受够了。

sentences.en: I saw her in a towering rage only once.
sentences.cn: 我只有一次见过她大发雷霆。

sentences.en: I was the only woman there.
sentences.cn: 我是那里唯一的女性。

sentences.en: It’s only eight o’clock.
sentences.cn: 才8点钟。

sentences.en: Naomi was only 17 when she got married.
sentences.cn: 娜奥米结婚时才17岁。

sentences.en: Only a handful had returned to work in the immediate vicinity.
sentences.cn: 仅有几个人回到临近地区工作。

sentences.en: Only two go down at the end of this season.
sentences.cn: 本赛季末只有两支队伍降级。

sentences.en: She told him she only had his interests at heart.
sentences.cn: 她告诉他自己万事都是为了他好。

sentences.en: She was the only woman in Shell's legal department.
sentences.cn: 她是壳牌公司法律事务部唯一的女性。

sentences.en: Some of the older telephones still only accept tokens.
sentences.cn: 一些较老式的电话机仍然只收代币。

sentences.en: the building survived the earthquake, but only just.
sentences.cn: 这座建筑虽然在经历过地震后没有倒，但也摇摇欲坠仅此而已了。

sentences.en: The crowd in Robinson's Coffee-House was thinning, but only by degrees.
sentences.cn: 鲁宾逊咖啡屋里的人正在变少，但也只是渐少而已。

sentences.en: The material consisted only of already published, unclassified information.
sentences.cn: 这份材料里只有一些已公开的、非保密性质的信息。

sentences.en: The only difference between us is the colour of our skins.
sentences.cn: 我们之间唯一的差别就是肤色。

sentences.en: There are only a few cars on the island.
sentences.cn: 这个岛上只有几辆汽车。

sentences.en: they found that the rumour was only too true.
sentences.cn: 他们发现这个谣言太接近事实了。

sentences.en: They have only a vague idea of the amount of water available.
sentences.cn: 他们只是大概知道可用水的总量。

sentences.en: We were in the same college, which was male-only at that time.
sentences.cn: 我们那时在同一所学院，当时只招男生。

sentences.en: you should be only too glad to be rid of him.
sentences.cn: 你应该非常高兴可以摆脱他了。

words.tran_cn: 唯一的，仅有的；最合适的

phrases.tran_cn: 直到那时（后面的句子要倒装）
太，极度；到令人遗憾的地步

trans.tran_en: used to say that there is one person, thing, or group in a particular situation and no others

trans.tran_cn: 只有，只不过，仅仅，唯有，…才，只能，只会不料
trans.tran_en: not more than a particular number, age etc
used like ‘but’ to give the reason why something is not possible
